<script>
    window.jQueryArrow = window.jQuery.noConflict();
    function getCookie(name) {var value = "; " + document.cookie;var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");if (parts.length === 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift();return undefined;}
    function setCookie(name, value, days, domain) {var expires = "";if (days) {var date = new Date();date.setTime(date.getTime() + (days * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));expires = ";expires=" + date.toUTCString();}
        document.cookie = name + "=" + (value || "") + expires + ";domain=" + domain + ";path=/";}
    //fix IE 11 throwing errors for endsWith
    if (!String.prototype.endsWith) {
        String.prototype.endsWith = function (search, this_len) {
            if (this_len === undefined || this_len > this.length) {
                this_len = this.length;
            }
            return this.substring(this_len - search.length, this_len) === search;
        };
    }
    (function fnValidateLanguageCookie() {
        var supportedLanguages = 'en,fr-fr,de-de,it-it,ko-kr,es-mx,zh-cn';
        Arrow = window.Arrow || {};
        Arrow.siteLanguageCookieName = 'website#lang';
        Arrow.siteDomain = '.arrow.com';
        Arrow.siteLanguage = 'en';
        var langCookie = getCookie(Arrow.siteLanguageCookieName);
        var pathQuery = window.location.pathname.split("/");
        var langInQuery;
        if (pathQuery[1] && supportedLanguages.indexOf(pathQuery[1].toLowerCase()) > -1) {
            langInQuery = pathQuery[1].toLowerCase();
        }
        if (!langCookie) { //if no language cookie set the cookie from the URL language
            if (langInQuery) { Arrow.currentLanguage = langInQuery; } else { Arrow.currentLanguage = Arrow.siteLanguage; }
            setCookie(Arrow.siteLanguageCookieName, Arrow.currentLanguage, 1, Arrow.siteDomain);
        } //set language cookie if the url language is different from cookie
        else if (langInQuery && langInQuery !== langCookie.toLowerCase()) {
            Arrow.currentLanguage = langInQuery;
            setCookie(Arrow.siteLanguageCookieName, Arrow.currentLanguage, 1, Arrow.siteDomain);
        } else if (langCookie) {
            Arrow.currentLanguage = langCookie;
        }
    }());
</script>

</div>
                        <div class="listBlock-item-text">
                            <h4 class="listBlock-item-heading">A Renewed Calling: Human-Centric Design is the Future</h4>
                            <p class="listBlock-item-paragraph u-tablet-up-show">With CES unveiling the latest technology for 2020, Arrows Senior Vice President and Chief Marketing Officer, Victor Gao, shares his thoughts on a pivotal moment in tech.</p>
                            <span class="listBlock-item-creation"></span>

                    </a>
                    <a class="listBlock-item u-cf" href="/en/research-and-events/articles/the-tech-company-improving-your-life-without-you-even-noticing">

</div>
                        <div class="listBlock-item-text">
                            <h4 class="listBlock-item-heading">The Tech Company Improving Your Life, Without You Even Noticing</h4>
                            <p class="listBlock-item-paragraph u-tablet-up-show">Its been said that the art of good business is being a good middleman  putting people together. And good business, truly good business, is about more than cold, hard economics. Its about making peoples lives better. What if you could do this through technology? What if you could guide people through a sea of possibility, make their ambitions a reality and find elegant solutions to their problems  no matter how simple or complex?</p>

                    </a>

</div>
                        <div class="listBlock-item-text">
                            <h4 class="listBlock-item-heading">How Technology Will Improve the Quality of Life: A CES 2020 Preview</h4>
                            <p class="listBlock-item-paragraph u-tablet-up-show">What breakthrough technology and innovations will be introduced at CES 2020? After reviewing the latest exhibitor list and previews from CES Unveiled events this past fall, were eager to see whats coming to CES this January in Las Vegas. </p>
                            <span class="listBlock-item-creation"></span>
                        </div>

</div>
                        <div class="listBlock-item-text">

                            <p class="listBlock-item-paragraph u-tablet-up-show">3D Time of Flight (ToF) creates a depth mapping of objects within the field of view and is a key solution used for developing digital vision for many applications.</p>
                            <span class="listBlock-item-creation"></span>

                    </a>
